name: FIRST FROG
description:
with the help of their fellow frogs, a frog goes where no frog has gone before.

~1 min to play :~)

use arrow keys or WASD to move

credits

  • music is Synth 2 by Emily A. Sprague
  • (the amazing) RGBitsy is made by janosc
  • various Bitsy hacks written by Sean S. LeBlanc and David Mowatt
  • Bitsy is made by Adam Le Doux
